titleStmt.title: The imperiall and princely pedegree of the two most noble and vertuous princes lately married Friderick the first of this name, Prince Palatinate, Duke of Bauiere ... sprung from glorious Charlemaigne [brace] and [brace] Elizabeth, Infanta of Albion ... onely daughter of our most gracious soveraigne Charles-James / [by] Iames Maxwell.
titleStmt.author: Maxwell, James, b. 1581.

notesStmt.note: Includes portraits of Frederick and Elizabeth.
Imprint information supplied from STC (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in the Society of Antiquaries.
